description: Numbers n such that n | p(n)*q(n), where p() is the unrestricted partition function (A000041) and q is the distinct partition function (A000009).
mathematica: Do[ p = PartitionsP[ n ]; q = PartitionsQ[ n ]; If[ Mod[ p*q, n ] == 0, Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 11050} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 23 2001
